ygData.subject: Question for Rokenn
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Rokenn, I noticed your post on the Concert Hall where you mentioned that you killed Noble Dojorn. This is something we ve been wanting to do ourselves, but
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Rokenn, I noticed your post on the Concert Hall where you mentioned that
you killed Noble Dojorn.
This is something we've been wanting to do ourselves, but aren't sure how to
go about it. We've tried to pull him from his island to Gorgalosk island,
but he always seems to get stuck inside his windmill. We've pulled the
bladestorms without any problem, but haven't been able to get Dojorn to come
out. Have you guys pulled him? Or is there something I'm missing? Also,
how many people did you have when you took him down?


Elwyn
